content: **details** * pattern consists of 33 rounds * level is advanced * stitches/terms skip front/back loop blo/flo bp/fp leg wrap/yarn over slip_stitch chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet csdc tc dtr trtr cluster half_double_crochet-cluster popcorn extended popcorn decrease single_crochet#decrease double_crochet#decrease dtr#decrease trtr#decrease and picot * your gauge will determine things like hook size yardage finished size and height of stitches any of these things can be adjusted as needed ---------------------------------------------- **languages** only authorized translations are permitted * *russian language translation provided by ula tomaszewska and tested by tatyana norri and наталья коваленко * ------------------------------------------ **community** join our discussion and support group for designs by grace fearon on facebook 4 *thank you so very much to my testers on this pattern stella holmes marsha seiber margaret schwerin jeannie kious heather alexander sophia hoang * 1 https //gracefearon com/shop-2/theia-digital-pattern-pdf-english 2 https //gracefearon com/shop-2/theia-digital-pattern-pdf-russian 3 http //www gracefearon com/pattern-translator-application 4 https //www facebook com/groups/878254922303627/ 5 https //discord gg/atndgvj
